message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I want to set some limits on my account to help me stay in control of my spending. How can I do that?

I completely understand, and I’d be happy to assist you with that. Let’s run through security so I can access your account and provide the next steps. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is Lisa Anderson, my email is lisa.a@example.com, and my date of birth is September 10, 1994.

Thanks, Lisa. That's all correct! You can set personal limits through your account settings under the 'Responsible Gaming' section. Limits can be set for deposits, bets, and losses on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis.
Okay, and once I set a limit, can I change it later?
Yes, you can adjust your limits at any time. Decreasing a limit will take effect immediately, while increasing a limit will require a 24-hour cooling-off period before the change is applied.
That's good to know. Can I set limits on specific games or just overall spending?
Great question! You can set both overall spending limits and specific limits for certain games or betting categories, such as slots, sports betting, or live casino games.
Perfect. I’ll go ahead and set some limits now. Thanks for your help!
You're very welcome, Lisa! I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
